roleset.name: define arbitrarily
roleset.note: STIPULATE-V NOTES: Based on financial subcorpus; nominal 'stipulation' based on BOLT-6. No VNcls. (from stipulate.01-v)
STIPULATION-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from stipulation.01-n)

example.name: arg1 always sentential?
example.text: Maxicare said the plan stipulates that enrollees in the company's health plans will have valid claims covered in full.
example.arg: that enrollees in the company's health plans will have valid claims covered in full

example.name: nominal rel: stipulation
example.text: There is also an extremely strange legal provision , in criminal law there is no stipulation to engage the death penalty for misappropriation of public funds !
example.arg: to engage the death penalty for misappropriation of public funds
